# connectionPosition

**Instance Property**

The position of the wheel’s connection to the vehicle’s chassis.

## Declaration

```swift
var connectionPosition: SCNVector3 { get set }
```

## Discussion

This vector is expressed in the coordinate space of the node containing the vehicle’s chassis. When you create a wheel from a node, SceneKit uses the node’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/position] property as the wheel’s connection point.

## Managing a Wheel’s Connection to a Vehicle

- **axle**: The direction of the axis that the wheel spins around to move the vehicle.
- **steeringAxis**: The direction of the axis that the wheel pivots around to steer the vehicle.
